dict.acceptation: 内部的，内心的；精神的；秘密的；
内部，里面；射中接近靶心部分的一发；

sent.orig: Inner Focus: Chastise now benefits from Inner Focus. In addition, Starshards no longer consumes Inner Focus.
sent.trans: 心灵专注：消耗心灵专注现在可以施放责罚。另外，星辰碎片不再消耗心灵专注。

sent.orig: The child of Inner Party parents is in theory not born into the Inner Party.
sent.trans: 父母为核心党员，子女在理论上并不生来就是核心党员。

sent.orig: The wise man's resignation springs from inner void, not inner fire.
sent.trans: 聪明人任由内心爆发出空虚，而不是一团热火。

sent.orig: Enthusiasm is important because it is an inner fire, an inner light seeking its own source.
sent.trans: 热情是重要的，因为它是寻求自己来源的内在之火、内在之光。

sent.orig: The bearings with inner ring or without inner ring are available according to the utilization.
sent.trans: 根据应用场合的不同，可采用带内圈或不带内圈的轴承。
